      • bootConf

        public Blade bootConf(@NonNull
                      String bootConf)
        Set to start blade configuration file by default Boot config properties file in classpath directory.

        Without setting will read the classpath -> app.properties

        参数:
        bootConf - boot config file name
        返回:
        blade

      • environment

        public Blade environment(@NonNull
                         String key,
                         @NonNull
                         Object value)
        Set the environment variable for global use here
        参数:
        key - environment key
        value - environment value
        返回:
        blade

        Set to start the web server to monitor port, the default is 9000

        port - web server port
        返回:
        blade

      • listen

        public Blade listen(@NonNull
                    String address,
                    int port)
        Set to start the web server to listen the IP address and port The default will listen 0.0.0.0:9000
        参数:
        address - ip address
        port - web server port
        返回:
        blade

      • start

        public Blade start(Class<?> bootClass,
                   @NonNull
                   String address,
                   int port,
                   String... args)
        Start the blade web server
        参数:
        bootClass - Start the boot class, used to scan the class in all of the packages
        address - web server bind ip address
        port - web server bind port
        args - launch parameters
        返回:
        blade

        public Blade await()
